price: আমি ক’লোঁ, ‘তুমি ভয় নকৰিবা, নিশ্চয় তুমিয়েই জয় লাভ কৰিবা।
arabic: قُلۡنَا لَا تَخَفۡ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qul'nā lā takhaf innaka anta al-aʿlā
